input.sentences: when families get together | they like to share a meal .
even the youngest family members know that large family gatherings include lots of food and attention .
it 's the perfect time for the youngsters in the family to bond with older family members .
it 's also a time for adolescents and teens to share what has been happening in their lives and receive feedback from a variety of relatives .
it 's love that makes a family and creates a home .
output.sentences: My daughter has always loved to share appetizer platters with the family.
When she was young she was the center of attention.
As she grew up, she loved to be in front of the camera.
As a teenager, she spent a lot of time with her friends.
Now, as an adult, she loves to come home and spend time with her family.
